name: Water(Draw My Path)
description:
Water(Draw my path) is a strategic water puzzle physics based casual game where players draw lines and use these lines to direct the path of the water properly, guide the water and fill up all the jugs.

draw paths for the water to get in the jugs, be creative while drawing paths, you can draw narrow and wide paths, you can draw bowl like paths to trap some water before guiding it. Be creative!!

some jugs(colored jugs) require a specific water color to be filled up while some others require mixed colors to be filled up, some others only require your speed.

lines are drawn similarly to the way it's drawn in Sugar Sugar....Water(Draw My Path) is the perfect casual game that can be played whenever, to pass time or just for the fun of it                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     

this game is inspired by Sugar Sugar and Happy Glass..


Features
*Easy Control
* 50+ Levels
*Addictive(be warned!)
